name: FNAF With Giant Screaming Spiders
description:
The game is real janky, but that's ok!

Instructions:

1. Download the whole zip

2. Unzip it all into a new folder

3. Click Atrio.exe

4. Enjoy the jankiness!

Known Bugs:

1. The screaming sound sometimes doesn't work

2. When you die, the spider AI starts to act super wonky

3. The doors are MEGA sticky
